preparedRoutes.title: Thematic routes
preparedRoutes.description: You can't get around the whole VDNH in one day. But we have compiled for you thematic routes for any company and for any mood. Choose one and have time to see the most important. And then come back to see something new.

preparedRoute.incorrectIdError: Route with id {{routeId}} does not exist. Please choose another route

entrance.title: Route start
entrance.placeholder: Choose the starting point of the route

exit.title: End of the route
exit.placeholder: Choose the end point of the route
